text: Public and police rescued 13 star tortoises when they tried to cross the Tiruthuraipoondi-Vedaranyam highway near here on Saturday. Someone had let the star tortoises into the pond near the Panchayat Union Elementary School near here. As the amphibians came out of the water spot and tried to cross the highway road users alerted the police who came and rescued the tortoises and removed them to safety.
title: 13 star tortoises rescued
